Product Description

2-in-1 Halloween Christmas Projector Lights Moving Patterns Landscape Waterproof Light

Specifications:

Power Output: 14V

Power Consumption: 10.5W

Waterproof Grade: IP65

Power Input: 100-240V, 50/60HZ

Projection Distance: 3-7m / 8.94-22.96ft

Use Scene: Indoor/Outdoor

16 Slides Patterns Mode & 10 Colors Water Wave Mode Create Various Effects for Holiday

16 Holiday Slides Patterns: 5 for Christmas 3 for Halloween 1 for Thanksgiving 1 for Birthday 6 for Celebration

Package Includes:

1 * LED Projector Light

1 * Remote Controller (Without Batteries)

16 * Pattern Slides

1 * Power Adapter

1 * Flat Base

1 * Ground Stake

1 * User Manual

IP65 Waterproof & Easy to Install: The Christmas projector light is designed with an IP65 waterproof rating that is suitable for rain or snow weather. Note: Do not soak it in the water directly. It is easy to install, just find the place you want then plug it into the ground, stable and durable.
Indoor & Outdoor Use: Find the place you want then plug it on the ground, fixed on the wall, ceiling, or put it on a flat surface. To better work (get better brightness and visibility)in the dark environment, place the floodlight 10 -15ft from the projection surface. You also can remotely control the color setting.
Wireless Remote & Auto-Timer: The Halloween Christmas projector light comes with a remote controller and timer . You could use the RF wireless remote control to turn on or off the light, set time 2/4 hours, switch the color of the light, moving speed, and flashing speed to create a fantastical and dynamic effect.
Wonderful Holiday Decoration: This Christmas projector light has 16 slides, the best choice to liven up the atmosphere, suitable for Halloween, Christmas, Thanksgiving day, Valentine’s Day, birthday, holidays, etc. Also Great for a gift for family, relatives, friends or colleagues.

Read more

Product Description

THE MORE FUN

THE BETTER

Cool Game Sets for Outdoor Activities： While enjoying the fresh air, playing the ball catch game in backyard, park or on the lawn will be a very pleasant experience. Top Gift Idea: It will be a perfect idea to give away the toss and catch ball game set as a gift for Easter and birthday.More Interaction: To play the sport games at least 2 persons are required. So it will be a good chance for socialization and interaction among friends.Family Pack: 4 Pop-launcher Baskets and 6 balls, your whole family members can join the family games. You will enjoy the toss and catch ball game and love sports more than ever.

Mission and Vision of Duckura

Duckura are committed to the production and sales of toys for many years, and have been adhering to the provision of better quality, more creative, educational toys, and better service. Make kids learning in playing. Encourage parent and kids play outdoor and become friends.

Great sports and super fun!

Do you love sports and anything that involves throwing and grabbing a ball? Are your kids crazy about ball catching games?

If the answer to those questions is yes, then you should try these sport toys. We have designed the ball catching game that will offer you endless hours of ball throwing and catching.

PACKING LIST

Pop-launcher Baskets x 4 (2 Blue & 2 Green) Balls x 6 (3 Green + 3 Red) Colorful Storage Box x 1

High Premium and Safe Material

The launcher baskets and balls are made from high-quality ABS plastic. You will never worry about your kids getting hurt.

Educational Sports for Kids

This catch ball set will help your kids develop fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, problem-solving, spatial and communication skills!

Activities for Indoor & Outdoor

Our catch ball games can be played both indoor and outdoor.Very easy to take apart and assemble, convenient for taking to vacations, picnics, tailgating, camping, birthday parties and more!

Carnival Toss Games

Great Toy Set for Kids

【TOSS N’ CATCH GAMES】Are you boring during the holidays with family? This toss and catch ball sets are suit for you. Whatever backyard, lawn, camping, beach, pool or indoor, you can play with them anywhere you want.
【EASY To PLAY】Hold the ball holder basket in your hands, press the trigger to launch the ball and another one use basket to catch it. Let’s start the throwing and catching ball races with friends.
【ADULTS & KIDS ACTIVE】These sports games are good ideal for both kids and adults, whatever different skill levels. Suitable to indoor or outdoor activities with family.
【DEVELOP FINE MOTOR SKILLS】Besides being fun, this sport toys can help your kids collaborate and interact with other kids more easily. Help them develop fine motor skills and increase social skills.
【PACKAGE INCLUDE】Package will Comes with 4 launchers(2-blue and 2-green), 6 ping-pong balls(2 color random) and Exquisite Color box.(Great for Gifts).

THE MORE FUN

THE BETTER

Product Description

【Solar Powered Magic-Automatic Lighting】Powered by free solar energy, no wiring or external power is required. Turn on the switch at the bottom of the lantern. After it is fully charged during the day, it will automatically light up at night, which solves the trouble of frequent switching.
【LED Flickering Flameless Candle & Retro Design】Solar lanterns have built-in silicone, waterproof and dustproof, so don’t worry about rain, snow, frost or sleet. This solar lantern is illuminated by LED Flickering flameless Candles, suitable for outdoor use, it is one of the best choices for decorating gardens, parties, balconies, balconies and yards.
【What You Get】2*solar lanterns(size:5.5″L, 14″H, 5.51″W), our worry-free 24-month warranty. If you have any problems, please feel free to contact us and we promise to solve your problem within 24 hours.

Price: $26.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:15:08 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Do you want to organize a dazzling party for the coming Christmas?

Our Christmas Projector Lights can help you realize this idea, creating the perfect party atmosphere and giving you a wonderful party with a unique style!

Just place it on the lawn and plug it in, you can cast dynamic patterns on the wall. 16 interchangeable slides, dynamic or static, not only for Christmas but also for Halloween, Easter, weddings, New Year, or birthdays! Decorated with it, your house will attract everyone’s attention at every carnival! Choose it, choose your amazing pleasure!

Place the projector lights 10 to 15ft from the projection surface for better results brightness and visibility.

Ultra-long 3m / 10ft power wire will easily reach most house outlets where you set it. (The darker the surroundings, the better the projection effect).

Package Content:

1x projection lamp

1x ground spike

1x 16 slides

1x user manual

【Easy Installation and Operation】Installation of the projector lamp is very convenient. You only have to loosen the two screws on the lamp body to easily switch the image card. Besides, the stable base is suitable for placing in a position on a level surface. And you can also use the attached ground spike, which is practical for you to install the lamp on the ground or on the lawn.
【IP44 Waterproof & Extreme Weather Resistance 】The IP44 waterproof Christmas projector lamp can withstand heavy rain, cold snow, and hot weather. The thick plastic shell further strengthens the rain cover and protects the lamps.
【Adjustable angle and Images Size】With the 3m long cable, the LED Christmas projector lamp extends the area and image size that can be illuminated. The 180 ° vertical adjustable angle can freely adjust the angle, giving you more options to display beautiful bright patterns.
【The Perfect Winter Gift for Your Family】 The LED Projection Lamp uses high-quality cards to deliver a bright and clear Image effect. A winter surprise for the family, spend the happy holidays with relatives together!
